title: How to Send Investigation Results via email?
body:
Follow these steps on how to send Investigation Results using email on Demand:
Open Patient Record
Click Investigation and Click Results
Locate the Results you want to send then Tick the Box
Click More then Select Print.
Under the "Destination" section, select "Save as PDF" to download the results and Click Save


Go back to the Patient Record 
Click Clinical Tab and Select Correspondence OUT
Click Import and fill in all required fields.
The required fields are as follows: Set the 'Status' to 'Final,' select 'Any Subject and Details', choose the 'Results' category, and upload the Results files.

Click Save
For additional steps in sending Results to patients or contacts using email on demand, please see this article. How to Send an Email to Contacts or Patient.
  What is Email on Demand?
